title: BRIEF-Boeing Selects Spirit Aerosystems To Support B-52 Commercial Engine Replacement Program
text:
* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS INC - TOTAL CERP EFFORT IS EXPECTED TO REPLACE 608 ENGINES ON U.S. AIR FORCE FLEET OF B-52H MODELS.

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS INC - SPIRIT WILL SUPPORT EXTENDING LIFE OF B-52 STRATOFORTRESS THROUGH AT LEAST 2050 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
